Object.Table: SELECT Id,Name FROM sysobjects WHERE (xtype = 'U') AND (status >= 0) ORDER BY name
Object.View: SELECT Id,Name FROM sysobjects WHERE (xtype = 'V') AND (status >= 0) ORDER BY name
Object.StoredProcedure: SELECT Id,Name FROM sysobjects WHERE (xtype = 'P') AND (status >= 0) ORDER BY name

Property.Table: select Column_name as [Name], Data_type + (CASE WHEN CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH IS NULL THEN '' WHEN CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH >=0 THEN '('+CONVERT(VARCHAR,CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH)+')' ELSE '(MAX)' END) as [Type], case when exists(select * from information_schema.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE as b where b.table_name = a.table_name and b.column_name=a.column_name) then 1 else 0 end as isKey, (SELECT value FROM ::fn_listextendedproperty (NULL, 'user', 'dbo', 'table', a.table_name, 'column', a.column_name) as e where e.name='MS_Description' ) AS Note, Column_default as [Default] from information_schema.COLUMNS as a WHERE TABLE_NAME = '{NAME}'
Property.StoredProcedure: SELECT sc.name AS Name, (st.name +'('+CONVERT(varchar,sc.length)+')') AS Type, sc.isoutparam AS IsKey,'' AS Note,''as [Default] FROM syscolumns sc INNER JOIN systypes st ON sc.xtype = st.xtype WHERE (sc.id = {ID}) AND (st.name not in ('sysname','BuildItemIDKind')) ORDER BY sc.colorder
